str2: A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 2nd Person Singular

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A primary preposition; 'fore', i.e. In front of, prior to.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
